mapper.select: SELECT users_no , users_id , users_email , users_birth , users_rnn , users_gender , users_name , users_phone , FIND_COMMONCODE(users_state) users_state , users_nick , users_role , users_join_dt , file_id FROM users

SELECT users_no , users_id , users_email , users_birth , users_rnn , users_gender , users_name , users_phone , FIND_COMMONCODE(users_state) users_state , users_nick , users_role , users_join_dt , file_id FROM users WHERE users_no = #{uno}
